item.title: On the Love of Monospace Fonts
item.description: I think good fonts can elevate a design and bad fonts do the opposite. As a reader my most intimate relationship is with print. The curves, the spacing, serif or sans, everything comes together to create a character of the graphemes. Over the years I have liked (and then stopped linking) many fonts. I’m listing some of my current favourites. Proportional Fonts This is the type of font that you would see most often (almost always).
